text: The 22nd Huading Awards ceremony was held on May 18, 2017 at Suzhou.http://ent.sina.com.cn/v/m/2017-04-28/doc-ifyetwsm0910503.shtml ==Nominations and winners== Complete list of nominees and winners (denoted in bold)http://ent.sina.com.cn/v/m/2017-04-25/doc- ifyepsch3123714.shtmlhttp://www.shanghaidaily.com/nation/Huading-Awards- nominations-announced/shdaily.shtmlhttp://ent.sina.com.cn/v/m/2017-05-18/doc- ifyfkqiv6504071.shtml {| class=wikitable style="width="100%" |- !
